document.forum_title: Latest Computer Industry News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: German minister seeks facial recognition at airports, train stations
document.topic_text: German minister seeks facial recognition at airports, train stations Monday, 22 August 2016 ( BERLIN (Reuters) - Germany's Interior Minister wants to introduce facial recognition software at train stations and airports to help identify terror suspects... Reuters Germany's Interior Minister wants to introduce facial recognition software at train stations and airports to help identify terror suspects following two Islamist... RTE.ie Germany's interior minister has called for facial recognition technology in video cameras at airports and train stations. SBS Germany's Interior Minister Thomas de Maiziere, 62, wants to introduce facial recognition software at airports and train stations to help catch terrorists... MailOnline Interior Minister Thomas de Maiziere says he wants new video camera technology at train stations and airports. Al Jazeera Twitter Security Information #news : German minister seeks facial recognition at airports, train stations https://t.co/lRRK4HLijk 1 minute ago Mong Ah Kang German minister seeks facial recognition at airports, train stations https://t.co/Dc1QymW6bF 2 minutes ago Temmy Van German minister seeks facial recognition at airports, train stations https://t.co/sb2XSoPNWL 2 minutes ago PKI German minister seeks facial recognition at airports, train stations https://t.co/vu6WU5XeUg 2 minutes ago Aladin German minister seeks facial recognition at airports, train stations https://t.co/AzGotKhAJ4 2 minutes ago Ben Betler German minister seeks facial recognition at airports, train stations https://t.co/u2tVMcwFh7 2 minutes ago
